Name: heat production, at hard coal industrial furnace 1-10MW | heat, district or industrial, other than natural gas | EN15804GD, U
Category: D:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/35:Electricity, gas, steam and air conditioning supply/353:Steam and air conditioning supply/3530:Steam and air conditioning supply
Description: Average technology installed in early 1990s. The stoker-boiler furnace is used as reference technology. The efficiency factor of an industrial hard coal furnace is between 84% and 90%. Taking into account the less favorable part-load behavior and the losses through storage, a net efficiency of 80% is assumed.;Reference:;DGMK-Arbeitskreis (1992) Ansatzpunkte und Potentiale zur Minderung des Treibhauseffektes aus Sicht der fossilen Energieträger.
